name: Grail of Blood
loreDescription: What wishes may be granted by this Death Goblet that holds the blood of so many victims?

skillDescription.base: Recovers Health equal to 10.0% of the caster's Attack at the start of the turn. Effect is increased 1.5 times if Health is below 30%.
skillDescription.max: Recovers Health equal to 20.0% of the caster's Attack at the start of the turn. Effect is increased 1.5 times if Health is below 30%.
